name: The Clique | 10 Question Literature Multiple Choice Quiz

questions.explanation:
Alicia.

	Alicia looks like a model.

Dylan.

	Dylan is on the Zone diet.

Layne.

	Layne's last name is Abeley.

questions.text: What is the name of Massie's horse?
questions.explanation:
Brownie.

	Chris's horse is named Tricky.

questions.text: What is the name of Layne's horse?
Who lives in the Brickview apartments?
questions.explanation:
Kristen.

	Claire finds this out while she is pretending to be Massie online.

questions.text: Who has a brother named Todd?
questions.explanation:
Claire.

	Todd is ten years old.

questions.text: Claire lives next door to Massie.
questions.explanation:
false.

	Claire lives in Massie's guesthouse.

questions.text: Massie ends up liking Claire, at least somewhat.
questions.explanation:
True.

	They talk in the bushes while their parents sing "100 Bottles Of Beer On the Wall."
